meanings.sent1: The firefighter was very courageous when he saved the kitten from the burning building.
meanings.sent2: She felt courageous as she stood up to the bully at school.
meanings.sent3: The little squirrel felt courageous as it faced the big, scary acorn.
meanings.sent4: The courageous knight bravely fought the dragon to protect the kingdom.
meanings.sent5: The courageous astronaut fearlessly explored the unknown depths of space.

meanings.definition: Possessing or characterized by courage; brave.
meanings.sent1: The courageous soldier led his team into battle without hesitation.
meanings.sent2: The mountain climber was known for his courageous spirit in facing dangerous peaks.
meanings.sent3: The tiny ant felt courageous as it stood up to the much larger grasshopper.
meanings.sent4: The courageous leader fearlessly guided his people through the stormy times.
meanings.sent5: The courageous explorer ventured into the uncharted jungle with determination.
